sentence: If you decide to come here make sure you bring your own towels shampoo and rent a car if you like to experience some of the outside activities the island offers
I can not even begin to describe my terrible experience
Why are not they electric the gas powered carts causes for a lot of noise pollution in what would be an otherwise outstanding environment
Not our experience – from the woman who checked us in to the staff at the restaurants to the staff at the pool EVERYONE was rude and paid you no attention
Tanya De La Cruz the chief manager at this resort was probably my most frustrating moment from this entire experience
We had several incidents occur during our stay which basically RUINED our experience at this resort
If you are a golfer the Trump course is just down the road and offers a dramatic layout and challenge for any level of experience
There is not a big restaurant scene nearby so the resort is the only option
The only aspect that should be on the next scope of work is a suites refresher
No complaints except aesthetics of spa itself

Could not have asked for a better time thank you to Reynaldo at the front desk who upgraded our room to an ocean view room made the whole experience that much better sunrise and sunsets never looked so good
Decor was gorgeous vibrant and colorful
Made a reservation for me and my family so we can spend a couple of days with the children in a family ambiance
Great customer service and experience
My Firsr Ever Wedding Experience
Great experience loved every second of it
I had a completely different experience and found everyone we encountered to be kind efficient and extremely helpful
I especially like the bathrooms the shower was one of the best I have experienced at a hotel The hotel is small enough that you can walk anywhere
And I ’m sure I ’d like to stay again in San Juan to enjoy the bustling livelier South Beach like Miami Beach atmosphere
The best experience we have ever had at a resort
